items.name: query - Count of All taggable Resources

content.query:
resources
| where "{unTaggableResources}" !has type 
| extend compliant = iff(tags.editor == "" or tags.lasteditiondate == "" or tags.creationdate == "" or tags.creator == "","Not Compliant", "Compliant")
| summarize count(type) by compliant
content.title: Tag Compliancy by Resource Count

items.name: query - Tag Compliancy by Resource Count

content.query:
resources
| where "{unTaggableResources}" !has type 
| extend editor = iff(tags.editor == '', "Unavailable", "Available")
| extend lasteditiondate = iff(tags.lasteditiondate == '', "Unavailable", "Available")
| extend creator = iff(tags.creator == '', "Unavailable", "Available")
| extend creationdate = iff(tags.creationdate == '', "Unavailable", "Available")
| summarize count() by editor,lasteditiondate,creator,creationdate
content.title: Overview - Mandatory Tags

content.query:
resources
| where tags.editor != "" and tags.lasteditiondate != "" and tags.creator != "" and tags.creationdate != ""
| where iif("{editor}" == '', "none", "({editor})") contains_cs tags.editor 
| where iif("{lasteditiondate}" == '', "none", "({lasteditiondate})") contains_cs tags.lasteditiondate 
| where iif("{creator}" == '', "none", "({creator})") contains_cs tags.creator 
| where iif("{creationdate}" == '', "none", "({creationdate})") contains_cs tags.creationdate 
| extend type = case(
type contains 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces', 'Log Analytics Workspaces',
type contains 'microsoft.netapp/netappaccounts', 'NetApp Accounts',
type contains 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', "App Service Plans",
type contains 'microsoft.web/sites', "App Services",
type contains "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines", "Azure Compute",
type contains "microsoft.logic/workflows", "LogicApps",
type contains 'microsoft.keyvault/vaults', "Key Vaults",
type contains 'microsoft.storage/storageaccounts', "Storage Accounts",
type contains 'microsoft.compute/availabilitysets', 'Availability Sets',
type contains 'microsoft.insights/components','Application Insights',
type contains 'microsoft.desktopvirtualization/applicationgroups', 'WVD Application Groups',
type contains 'microsoft.desktopvirtualization/workspaces', 'WVD Workspaces',
type contains 'microsoft.desktopvirtualization/hostpools', 'WVD Hostpools',
type contains 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults', 'Backup Vaults',
type contains 'microsoft.insights/webtests', 'URL Web Tests',
type contains 'microsoft.web/connections', 'LogicApp Connectors',
type contains 'microsoft.web/customapis','LogicApp API Connectors',
type contains 'microsoft.managedidentity/userassignedidentities','Managed Identities',
type contains 'microsoft.storagesync/storagesyncservices', 'Azure File Sync',
type contains 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines', 'ARC Machines',
type contains 'Microsoft.EventHub/namespaces', 'Event Hub Namespaces',
type contains 'Microsoft.EventGrid/systemTopics', 'Event Grid System Topics',
type contains 'Microsoft.Sql', 'SQL Resources',
type contains 'Microsoft.HDInsight/clusters', 'HDInsight Clusters',
type contains 'microsoft.insights/workbooks', 'Monitor Workbooks',
type contains 'microsoft.devtestlab', 'DevTest Labs Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.containerinstance', 'Container Instances Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.portal/dashboards', 'Azure Dashboards',
type contains 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', 'Container Registry',
type contains 'microsoft.automation', 'Automation Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters', 'AKS Clusters',
type contains 'sendgrid.email/accounts', 'SendGrid Accounts',
type contains 'microsoft.datafactory/factories', 'Data Factory',
type contains 'microsoft.databricks/workspaces', 'Databricks Workspaces',
type contains 'microsoft.machinelearningservices/workspaces', 'Machine Learnings Workspaces',
type contains 'microsoft.compute', 'Compute Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/smartdetectoralertrules', 'Smart Detector Alert Rules',
type contains 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', 'API Management Services',
type contains 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql', 'PostgreSQL Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.scheduler/jobcollections', 'Scheduler Job Collections',
type contains 'microsoft.eventgrid/topics', 'Event Grid Topics',
type contains 'microsoft.visualstudio/account', 'Azure DevOps Organization',
type contains 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworks', 'Virtual Networks',
type contains 'Microsoft.Network/routeTables', 'Route Tables',
type contains 'microsoft.network/networksecuritygroups', 'Network Security Groups',
type contains 'microsoft.network/applicationsecuritygroups', 'Application Security Groups',
type contains 'microsoft.network/applicationgateways', 'Application Gateways',
type contains 'microsoft.network/publicipaddresses', 'Public Ip Addresses',
type contains 'microsoft.network/', 'Other Network Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.classic', 'ASM Obsolete Resources',
strcat("Not Translated: ", type))
| summarize count() by type
content.title: Tagged Resources Count by Type

items.name: query - Tagged Resources Count by Type

content.query:
resources
| where tags.editor != "" and tags.lasteditiondate != "" and tags.creator != "" and tags.creationdate != ""
| where iif("{editor}" == '', "none", "({editor})") contains_cs tags.editor 
| where iif("{lasteditiondate}" == '', "none", "({lasteditiondate})") contains_cs tags.lasteditiondate 
| where iif("{creator}" == '', "none", "({creator})") contains_cs tags.creator 
| where iif("{creationdate}" == '', "none", "({creationdate})") contains_cs tags.creationdate 
| extend Details = pack_all()
| project subscriptionId, resourceGroup, id, type, location, Details
content.title: Tagged Resources

content.query:
resources
| where "{unTaggableResources}" !has type 
| where tags.application == "" or tags.domain == "" or tags.environment == "" or tags.editor == "" or tags.lasteditiondate == "" or tags.deploymentmode == "" or tags.owner == "" or tags.criticality == "" or tags.creator == ""
| extend Details = pack_all()
| project subscriptionId, resourceGroup, id, type, location, Details
content.title: Untagged Resources

content.query:
traces
| where message contains "tag with user"
| extend resourceId = substring(message, indexof(message, "/subscriptions/"))
| extend type = substring(resourceId, indexof(resourceId, "/providers/")+11)
| extend type = case(
type contains 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces', 'Log Analytics Workspaces',
type contains 'microsoft.netapp/netappaccounts', 'NetApp Accounts',
type contains 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', "App Service Plans",
type contains 'microsoft.web/sites', "App Services",
type contains "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines", "Azure Compute",
type contains "microsoft.logic/workflows", "LogicApps",
type contains 'microsoft.keyvault/vaults', "Key Vaults",
type contains 'microsoft.storage/storageaccounts', "Storage Accounts",
type contains 'microsoft.compute/availabilitysets', 'Availability Sets',
type contains 'microsoft.insights/components','Application Insights',
type contains 'microsoft.desktopvirtualization/applicationgroups', 'WVD Application Groups',
type contains 'microsoft.desktopvirtualization/workspaces', 'WVD Workspaces',
type contains 'microsoft.desktopvirtualization/hostpools', 'WVD Hostpools',
type contains 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults', 'Backup Vaults',
type contains 'microsoft.insights/webtests', 'URL Web Tests',
type contains 'microsoft.web/connections', 'LogicApp Connectors',
type contains 'microsoft.web/customapis','LogicApp API Connectors',
type contains 'microsoft.managedidentity/userassignedidentities','Managed Identities',
type contains 'microsoft.storagesync/storagesyncservices', 'Azure File Sync',
type contains 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines', 'ARC Machines',
type contains 'Microsoft.EventHub/namespaces', 'Event Hub Namespaces',
type contains 'Microsoft.EventGrid/systemTopics', 'Event Grid System Topics',
type contains 'Microsoft.Sql', 'SQL Resources',
type contains 'Microsoft.HDInsight/clusters', 'HDInsight Clusters',
type contains 'microsoft.insights/workbooks', 'Monitor Workbooks',
type contains 'microsoft.devtestlab', 'DevTest Labs Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.containerinstance', 'Container Instances Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.portal/dashboards', 'Azure Dashboards',
type contains 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', 'Container Registry',
type contains 'microsoft.automation', 'Automation Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters', 'AKS Clusters',
type contains 'sendgrid.email/accounts', 'SendGrid Accounts',
type contains 'microsoft.datafactory/factories', 'Data Factory',
type contains 'microsoft.databricks/workspaces', 'Databricks Workspaces',
type contains 'microsoft.machinelearningservices/workspaces', 'Machine Learnings Workspaces',
type contains 'microsoft.compute', 'Compute Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/smartdetectoralertrules', 'Smart Detector Alert Rules',
type contains 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', 'API Management Services',
type contains 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql', 'PostgreSQL Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.scheduler/jobcollections', 'Scheduler Job Collections',
type contains 'microsoft.eventgrid/topics', 'Event Grid Topics',
type contains 'microsoft.visualstudio/account', 'Azure DevOps Organization',
type contains 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworks', 'Virtual Networks',
type contains 'Microsoft.Network/routeTables', 'Route Tables',
type contains 'microsoft.network/networksecuritygroups', 'Network Security Groups',
type contains 'microsoft.network/applicationsecuritygroups', 'Application Security Groups',
type contains 'microsoft.network/applicationgateways', 'Application Gateways',
type contains 'microsoft.network/publicipaddresses', 'Public Ip Addresses',
type contains 'microsoft.network/', 'Other Network Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.classic', 'ASM Obsolete Resources',
strcat("Not Translated: ", type))
| summarize count() by type
//| where type !has "Not Translated"
content.title: Taggued actions by resource types

items.name: query - Overview Resource Taggued by type

content.query:
traces
| extend hour = floor(timestamp % 1d, 1h)
| where message !contains_cs "Executed 'Functions.TagRemediate'"
| extend action = case(message contains_cs 'tag with user', 'Tag',
                        severityLevel == 2 and 
                        message !contains_cs 'is queuing requests as there are no available runspace' and
                        message !contains_cs 'Skipping event as last writer is the function itself', 'Warning',
                    severityLevel == 3, 'Error',
                    'Other Information')
| where action in ('Tag', 'Warning', 'Error')
| summarize count() by bin(timestamp, 30m), action
| render timechart
content.title: Tag activity

content.query:
traces
| where message contains "tag with user" and operation_Name == "<FunctionName>"
| extend resourceId = substring(message, indexof(message, "/subscriptions/"))
| project timestamp, resourceId, operation_Id, severityLevel, message
| sort by timestamp desc
content.title: Last taggued resources

content.query:
traces
| where severityLevel == 2 and operation_Name == "<FunctionName>"
| extend resourceId = substring(message, indexof(message, "/subscriptions/"))
| project timestamp, resourceId, operation_Id, severityLevel, message
| sort by timestamp desc
content.title: Warning Traces

content.query:
traces
| where severityLevel == "3" and operation_Name == "<FunctionName>"
| sort by timestamp desc
content.title: Error in traces
